attributes.action: Have another referendum to re join the European Union
attributes.additional_details: In the times we’re living with an unstable and erratic US, an aggressive Russia and unjust China we must create stronger ties and alliances in Europe. Joining the EU would be a great way to achieve this goal. We’ve tried being separate and the country has still not recovered. We have a duty to ourselves and our future to reverse this mistake.
attributes.background: The government should have another referendum to rejoin the EU. Leaving the EU was a terrible mistake economically, politically and defensively. The ties created for us and the stability it brought was so important and needs to be re established.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700041
